data.author: Thomas Hunsaker

changelog.release_notes:
New app icons!
Added last checked in venue to menu (AppGlance).
Rebuilt with SDK4 added support for Diorite.

New Features:
Configuration setting screen
Timeline Integration
5 Themes to choose from
Choose distance units
Support for Cyrillic chars
No more Aplite (Pebble Classic) :(

Fixed crashes on iOS/Aplite.
Updated distance display craziness.

Pebble Time Round Design,
Spanish Translation. --  

Español:
Nuevo diseño para el Pebble Time Round,
¡Se habla español!
Twitter and Facebook sharing are now working!
New look! Colors (for Pebble Time)! Pretty animations!
Minor bug fixes. App doesn't force user back to the list once a venue has been selected.

Improved overall reliability and phone to pebble communication. See your last checkin! Slightly longer venue list (15). Watch buzzes once the venue list has loaded to let you know it is time to pick a venue! Added Strap analytics to get a better idea of how/where the app is being used.

See your last checkin!
Slightly longer venue list (15)
Watch now buzzes once the venue list has loaded to let you know it is time to pick a venue!
Improved overall reliability and phone to pebble communication.

Fixed bug checking into places with apostrophes.
Added vibration once list has loaded completely.
Updated Foursquare API calls to pass new parameters related to their app split.

App now auto-closes 10 seconds after successful checkin.
Minor bug fixes.

data.description:
Spoon is a simple Foursquare/Swarm check-in app for Pebble. The watchapp lists nearby venues using your phone's GPS location. Pick a venue and check-in. All from your wrist.

Español
Spoon es un app simple para Foursquare y Swarm. Usando el GPS del su celular para listar los lugares cercano. Elige uno y haz "check-in" desde tu pulsera.
data.title: Spoon
